{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13108v1", "title": "Global patterns in signed permutations", "summary": "Global permutation patterns have recently been shown to characterize
important properties of a Coxeter group. Here we study global patterns in the
context of signed permutations, with both characterizing and enumerative
results. Surprisingly, many properties of signed permutations may be
characterized by avoidance of the same set of patterns as the corresponding
properties in the symmetric group. We also extend previous enumerative work of
Egge, and our work has connections to the Garfinkle--Barbasch--Vogan
correspondence, the Erd\H{o}s--Szekeres theorem, and well-known integer
sequences.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-17T17:22:46Z"}
